actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest on obligations issued to finance hazardous waste disposal facilities shall be exempt from Federal income tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the tax exclusion of interest on industrial development bonds to obligations issued to finance hazardous waste disposal facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that interest on obligations issued to finance hazardous waste disposal facilities shall be exempt from Federal income tax.
